Row.Text: Unique Zulu Barracks replacement. +15 XP for all Units and grants unique promotions to pre-gunpowder melee units.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Zulu Barracks replacement. +15 XP for all Units and grants unique promotions to pre-gunpowder melee units.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Zulu Barracks replacement. +15 XP for all Units and grants unique promotions to pre-gunpowder melee units.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Zulu Barracks replacement. +15 XP for all Units and grants unique promotions to pre-gunpowder melee units.
Melee Units cost 50% less maintenance. All Units require 25% less experience to earn their next Promotion.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Melee Units cost 50% less maintenance. All Units require 25% less experience to earn their next Promotion.
